byline.contributor: Patrick Zuo, Mia Li and Chen Jiehao contributed research.

abstract: Chinese e-commerce sites have become steady source of illegal synthetic drugs in global market, with Chinese authorities showing little interest in regulating network of clandestine labs and exporters; drugs, including dangerous new stimulants and hallucinogens, are readily available in United States and have been linked to deaths; China is also major exporter of methamphetamine components, which have been seized on by drug cartels even as other nations crack down.
lead_paragraph: Authorities have shown little interest in seriously regulating clandestine labs, turning China into a leading producer and exporter of synthetic drugs.

headline.main: In China, Illegal Drugs Are Sold Online in an Unbridled Market
headline.print_headline: China Websites Flouting Laws on Illicit Drugs

snippet: Authorities have shown little interest in seriously regulating clandestine labs, turning China into a leading producer and exporter of synthetic drugs.
